Body: c3.js library accepts two data sources(production and time) in gauge graphs but only with one max value
column9:
Is there format to provide different max values for two data sources I used below format to accept two data sources for gauge graph 

var chart = c3.generate({	    data: {	        columns: [	            ['production'
column29: show: false // to turn off the min/max labels.	        }
column32: //can handle negative min e.g. vacuum / voltage / current flow / rate of change	    max: 100
column41: // the three color levels for the percentage values.	        threshold: {	//            unit: 'value'
column47:
size: { height: 180 } });

but this is accepting same max values for both data sources is there any provision for accepting two max values for each data source

refer this fiddle: https://jsfiddle.net/srinivasyl/nd25q7s6/8/
